articles.title: Liraglutide beneficial for post-diet weight loss maintenance - medwireNews
articles.description: A randomized trial supports giving people with obesity liraglutide to maintain weight loss after an 8-week diet, particularly if it is combined with regular vigorous exercise.
articles.content:
